de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISPTMEEngine


  • public interface ISPTMEEngine
    Provides functions to manage ptme module. The textobjects can be suggested for a mail dependent of the mail content. The operator mustn't search for them but select from suggestion panel left in the customer history tree.
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getPTMEEngineAPI().getDataForProject(id);

        Returns:

      • indexEmailForTextobject

        void indexEmailForTextobject(Connection con,
                           de.ityx.mediatrix.modules.ptme.data.TxtIndexEntry entry,
                           String text)
                             throws SQLException
        Sets index of a text object for the mail to find later all text objects for this mail
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        entry - data of text object TxtIndexEntry
        text - if "ptme.learnrealtime" in mediatrix properties is sets, the text parameter of a email will be learned for this text object
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • writeSemsForTxtEntry

                             throws SQLException
        Sets index of a text object for the mail to find later all text objects for this mail
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        entry - data of text object TxtIndexEntry
        text - the text parameter of a email, which will be learned for this text object
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getTextObjectsForEmail

        List<ITextObject> getTextObjectsForEmail(Connection con,
                                       String data,
                                       int operatorId)
                                         throws SQLException
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        data - text of a mail and subproject in string as "subprojectid|text" to find all text objects , which had been set for this text and subproject
        operatorId - operator id of the current operator
        Returns:
        list of TextObjects
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • shouldLearn

        void shouldLearn(Question question)
                 throws IOException
        Tries to contact the PTME Server to learn something from the mail. does not check for question#shouldLearn()! sets the learn attribute of a question to false
        Parameters:
        question -
        Throws:
        IOException - if the PTME Server is not available or a Exception occurred in the PTME Server
